text: BBC News Arabic (), formerly BBC Arabic Television, is a television news channel broadcast to the Arab World by the BBC. It was launched on 11 March 2008. It is run by the BBC World Service and funded from the British television licence fee. == Other websites == * * Live video stream * BBC Press Release * The Failed Dream That Lead To Al Jazeera * Faisal Abbas: "BBC Arabic TV 'should try to be different, " BBC 12 March 2008 * Eric Pfanner: "BBC Set to Open Its New Arab World TV Channel in New York Times 4 March 2008 * "BBC launches Arabic TV channel," BBC 11 March 2008 Category:1996 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:2008 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:BBC Category:1994 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: BBC News Arabic
